form.searchTemplate: index=nagios nagiosevent="CURRENT SERVICE STATE" src_host="$src_host$" name="$name$" | head 1 | dedup src_host,name | eval comment="Acknowledged via Splunk" | dedup src_host,name | liveserviceack | dedup src_host,name | table _time src_host name liveserviceack
form.html: Enter a hostname and service name in the fields below and an acknowledgement will be sent to Nagios via MK Livestatus.
